alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 2:17AM CDT until July 23 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CEDAR...SOUTHWESTERN JONES AND EAST CENTRAL LINN COUNTIES... At 217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Viola, or near Anamosa, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anamosa, Springville, Olin, Martelle, Morley, Center Junction, Whittier, Stone City, Viola, Matsell Bridge Natural Area, Wapsipinicon State Park, Hale, Scotch Grove, Central Park and Paralta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
